code: export var checkSubscription=function checkSubscription(study,subscriptions){return subscriptions.some(function(subscription){return subscription.StudyID===(study===null||study===void 0?void 0:study.ID);});};export var getRegionDescription=function getRegionDescription(study,regions){if(study){var _regions$find;return(_regions$find=regions.find(function(region){return region.ID===study.RegionID;}))===null||_regions$find===void 0?void 0:_regions$find.Name;}else{return"-";}};export var monthNames=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"];export var getMonthName=function getMonthName(month){return monthNames[month];};export var getCurrentMonth=function getCurrentMonth(){var numberMonthInThePast=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var currentDate=new Date();var currentMonth=currentDate.getMonth()-numberMonthInThePast;if(currentDate.getDate()<6){currentMonth--;}if(currentMonth<0){return 12+currentMonth;}else{return currentMonth;}};
